name: PTI WebTech
description:
Prerna Trimurty Infotech (PTI WebTech) is the web and mobile app development company offering advanced software solutions to the world.
We are based in Jaipur, India. We started the company in early 2009 with 2 people and now we have 40+ strong team members consistently performing par excellence and delivering solutions.
We are experts of PHP, Ruby on Rails, WordPress, Drupal, Magento, Shopify, and iOS & Android App development. We assure to provide safe outsourcing services, secure processes, and top quality results for your business. Each project is the most important to us.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 421, Jaipur Textile Market, Near Jagatpura Flyover
